headline: Albemarle Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
summary: The Board of Directors of Albemarle Corporation (NYSE: ALB) today announced that it declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.405 per share. The dividend, which has an annualized rate of $1.62, is payable April 1, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business as of March 13, 2026.

summary: The U.S. is miles behind on the domestic production of rare earth metals and alloys that support its tech and defense industries, but recently it started taking big steps to meet growing demand
